tool.name: Get.group
tool.description: group names from shared or from list and group
tool.command:
echo 'get.group( shared=$otu )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" &&
## parse relevant output from logfile to file cat "$logfile" | head -n-6 | sed '1,29d' > "$bootgroups"
tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The get.group_ command generate principle components plot data.
.. _get.group: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.group
v.1.20.0: Updated to Mothur 1.33
